function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in workplaces leading to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Installation or maintenance of adequate air replenishing systems or climate control systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Workers, office staff","Owner":"Management"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in open office layouts facilitating viral transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of aerial viral transmission among employees","Mitigation":"Redesigning office layouts to reduce crowding and promote physical distancing","Technologies":"Space optimization software, occupancy tracking systems","People":"Office managers, employees","Owner":"Management"},{"Description":"High-speed elevators in multistory office buildings becoming places of high infection spread propensity","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Encouraging the use of staircases, installing air quality monitoring systems in elevators","Technologies":"Elevator air purification systems, air quality sensors","People":"Employees, building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
